Gen1.name: Bulbasaur
Gen1.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

Gen1.name: Ivysaur
Gen1.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

Gen1.name: Venusaur
Gen1.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

Gen1.name: Charmander
Gen1.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

Gen1.name: Charmeleon
Gen1.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

Gen1.name: Charizard
Gen1.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

Gen1.name: Squirtle
Gen1.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

Gen1.name: Wartortle
Gen1.description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

Gen1.name: Blastoise
Gen1.description: A brutal POKéMON with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

Gen1.name: Caterpie
Gen1.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

Gen1.name: Metapod
Gen1.description: This POKéMON is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

Gen1.name: Butterfree
Gen1.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

Gen1.name: Weedle
Gen1.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

Gen1.name: Kakuna
Gen1.description: Almost incapable of moving, this POKéMON can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

Gen1.name: Beedrill
Gen1.description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

Gen1.name: Pidgey
Gen1.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

Gen1.name: Pidgeotto
Gen1.description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

Gen1.name: Pidgeot
Gen1.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

Gen1.name: Rattata
Gen1.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

Gen1.name: Raticate
Gen1.description: It uses its whiskers to maintain its balance. It apparently slows down if they are cut off.

Gen1.name: Spearow
Gen1.description: It flaps its small wings busily to fly. Using its beak, it searches in grass for prey.

Gen1.name: Fearow
Gen1.description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

Gen1.name: Ekans
Gen1.description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as PIDGEY and SPEAROW, whole.

Gen1.name: Arbok
Gen1.description: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

Gen1.name: Pikachu
Gen1.description: When several of these POKéMON gather, their electricity could build and cause lightning storms.

Gen1.name: Raichu
Gen1.description: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high-voltage power.

Gen1.name: Sandshrew
Gen1.description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

Gen1.name: Sandslash
Gen1.description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

Gen1.name: Nidoran♀
Gen1.description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this POKéMON dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

Gen1.name: Nidorina
Gen1.description: The female's horn develops slowly. Prefers physical attacks such as clawing and biting.

Gen1.name: Nidoqueen
Gen1.description: Its hard scales provide strong protection. It uses its hefty bulk to execute powerful moves.

Gen1.name: Nidoran♂
Gen1.description: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

Gen1.name: Nidorino
Gen1.description: An aggressive POKéMON that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

Gen1.name: Nidoking
Gen1.description: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

Gen1.name: Clefairy
Gen1.description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

Gen1.name: Clefable
Gen1.description: A timid fairy POKéMON that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

Gen1.name: Vulpix
Gen1.description: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

Gen1.name: Ninetales
Gen1.description: Very smart and very vengeful. Grabbing one of its many tails could result in a 1000-year curse.

Gen1.name: Jigglypuff
Gen1.description: When its huge eyes light up, it sings a mysteriously soothing melody that lulls its enemies to sleep.

Gen1.name: Wigglytuff
Gen1.description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

Gen1.name: Zubat
Gen1.description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

Gen1.name: Golbat
Gen1.description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

Gen1.name: Oddish
Gen1.description: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

Gen1.name: Gloom
Gen1.description: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

Gen1.name: Vileplume
Gen1.description: It has the world’s largest petals. With every step, the petals shake out heavy clouds of toxic pollen.

Gen1.name: Paras
Gen1.description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by draw­ ing nutrients from the bug host.

Gen1.name: Parasect
Gen1.description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

Gen1.name: Venonat
Gen1.description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

Gen1.name: Venomoth
Gen1.description: The dustlike scales covering its wings are color-coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

Gen1.name: Diglett
Gen1.description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

Gen1.name: Dugtrio
Gen1.description: A team of DIGLETT triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

Gen1.name: Meowth
Gen1.description: It washes its face regularly to keep the coin on its forehead spotless. It doesn’t get along with Galarian Meowth.

Gen1.name: Persian
Gen1.description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

Gen1.name: Psyduck
Gen1.description: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily POKéMON will use psychokinetic powers.

Gen1.name: Golduck
Gen1.description: Often seen swim­ ming elegantly by lake shores. It is often mistaken for the Japanese monster, Kappa.

Gen1.name: Mankey
Gen1.description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

Gen1.name: Primeape
Gen1.description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

Gen1.name: Growlithe
Gen1.description: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

Gen1.name: Arcanine
Gen1.description: A POKéMON that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

Gen1.name: Poliwag
Gen1.description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

Gen1.name: Poliwhirl
Gen1.description: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

Gen1.name: Poliwrath
Gen1.description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breast stroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

Gen1.name: Abra
Gen1.description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and TELEPORT to safety.

Gen1.name: Kadabra
Gen1.description: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

Gen1.name: Alakazam
Gen1.description: Its brain can out­ perform a super­ computer. Its intelligence quotient is said to be 5,000.

Gen1.name: Machop
Gen1.description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

Gen1.name: Machoke
Gen1.description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

Gen1.name: Machamp
Gen1.description: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

Gen1.name: Bellsprout
Gen1.description: A carnivorous POKéMON that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

Gen1.name: Weepinbell
Gen1.description: It spits out POISONPOWDER to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of ACID.

Gen1.name: Victreebel
Gen1.description: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

Gen1.name: Tentacool
Gen1.description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

Gen1.name: Tentacruel
Gen1.description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

Gen1.name: Geodude
Gen1.description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

Gen1.name: Graveler
Gen1.description: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

Gen1.name: Golem
Gen1.description: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without damage.

Gen1.name: Ponyta
Gen1.description: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

Gen1.name: Rapidash
Gen1.description: Very competitive, this POKéMON will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

Gen1.name: Slowpoke
Gen1.description: Incredibly slow and dopey. It takes 5 seconds for it to feel pain when under attack.

Gen1.name: Slowbro
Gen1.description: The SHELLDER that is latched onto SLOWPOKE's tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

Gen1.name: Magnemite
Gen1.description: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses THUNDER WAVE and similar moves.

Gen1.name: Magneton
Gen1.description: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

Gen1.name: Farfetchd
Gen1.description: The sprig of green onions it holds is its weapon. It is used much like a metal sword.

Gen1.name: Doduo
Gen1.description: A bird that makes up for its poor flying with its fast foot speed. Leaves giant footprints.

Gen1.name: Dodrio
Gen1.description: Uses its three brains to execute complex plans. While two heads sleep, one head stays awake.

Gen1.name: Seel
Gen1.description: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

Gen1.name: Dewgong
Gen1.description: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

Gen1.name: Grimer
Gen1.description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

Gen1.name: Muk
Gen1.description: Thickly covered with a filthy, vile sludge. It is so toxic, even its footprints contain poison.

Gen1.name: Shellder
Gen1.description: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

Gen1.name: Cloyster
Gen1.description: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

Gen1.name: Gastly
Gen1.description: Almost invisible, this gaseous POKéMON cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

Gen1.name: Haunter
Gen1.description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from an­ other dimension.

Gen1.name: Gengar
Gen1.description: Under a full moon, this POKéMON likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

Gen1.name: Onix
Gen1.description: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

Gen1.name: Drowzee
Gen1.description: Puts enemies to sleep then eats their dreams. Occasionally gets sick from eating bad dreams.

Gen1.name: Hypno
Gen1.description: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as HYPNOSIS and CONFUSION.

Gen1.name: Krabby
Gen1.description: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

Gen1.name: Kingler
Gen1.description: The large pincer has 10000 hp of crushing power. However, its huge size makes it unwieldy to use.

Gen1.name: Voltorb
Gen1.description: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a POKé BALL, they have zapped many people.

Gen1.name: Electrode
Gen1.description: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

Gen1.name: Exeggcute
Gen1.description: Often mistaken for eggs. When disturbed, they quickly gather and attack in swarms.

Gen1.name: Exeggutor
Gen1.description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an EXEGGCUTE.

Gen1.name: Cubone
Gen1.description: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this POKéMON's real face.

Gen1.name: Marowak
Gen1.description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

Gen1.name: Hitmonlee
Gen1.description: When in a hurry, its legs lengthen progressively. It runs smoothly with extra long, loping strides.

Gen1.name: Hitmonchan
Gen1.description: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

Gen1.name: Lickitung
Gen1.description: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

Gen1.name: Koffing
Gen1.description: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

Gen1.name: Weezing
Gen1.description: Where two kinds of poison gases meet, 2 KOFFINGs can fuse into a WEEZING over many years.

Gen1.name: Rhyhorn
Gen1.description: A POKéMON with a one-track mind. Once it charges,  it won't stop running until it falls asleep.

Gen1.name: Rhydon
Gen1.description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

Gen1.name: Chansey
Gen1.description: A rare and elusive POKéMON that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

Gen1.name: Tangela
Gen1.description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to sea­ weed. Its vines shake as it walks.

Gen1.name: Kangaskhan
Gen1.description: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

Gen1.name: Horsea
Gen1.description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

Gen1.name: Seadra
Gen1.description: Capable of swim­ ming backwards by rapidly flapping its wing-like pectoral fins and stout tail.

Gen1.name: Goldeen
Gen1.description: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

Gen1.name: Seaking
Gen1.description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

Gen1.name: Staryu
Gen1.description: If its body is torn, it can grow back if the red core remains. The core flashes at midnight.

Gen1.name: Starmie
Gen1.description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

Gen1.name: Mr-mime
Gen1.description: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

Gen1.name: Scyther
Gen1.description: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

Gen1.name: Jynx
Gen1.description: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

Gen1.name: Electabuzz
Gen1.description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

Gen1.name: Magmar
Gen1.description: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

Gen1.name: Pinsir
Gen1.description: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

Gen1.name: Tauros
Gen1.description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

Gen1.name: Magikarp
Gen1.description: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

Gen1.name: Gyarados
Gen1.description: Once it begins to rampage, a GYARADOS will burn everything down, even in a harsh storm.

Gen1.name: Lapras
Gen1.description: A POKéMON that has been over­ hunted almost to extinction. It can ferry people across the water.

Gen1.name: Ditto
Gen1.description: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

Gen1.name: Eevee
Gen1.description: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element STONEs.

Gen1.name: Vaporeon
Gen1.description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

Gen1.name: Jolteon
Gen1.description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000- volt lightning bolts.

Gen1.name: Flareon
Gen1.description: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

Gen1.name: Porygon
Gen1.description: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

Gen1.name: Omanyte
Gen1.description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

Gen1.name: Omastar
Gen1.description: A prehistoric POKéMON that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

Gen1.name: Kabuto
Gen1.description: A POKéMON that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

Gen1.name: Kabutops
Gen1.description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swim­ ming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

Gen1.name: Aerodactyl
Gen1.description: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

Gen1.name: Snorlax
Gen1.description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

Gen1.name: Articuno
Gen1.description: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

Gen1.name: Zapdos
Gen1.description: A legendary bird POKéMON that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

Gen1.name: Moltres
Gen1.description: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

Gen1.name: Dratini
Gen1.description: Long considered a mythical POKéMON until recently when a small colony was found living underwater.

Gen1.name: Dragonair
Gen1.description: A mystical POKéMON that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

Gen1.name: Dragonite
Gen1.description: An extremely rarely seen marine POKéMON. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

Gen1.name: Mewtwo
Gen1.description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

Gen1.name: Mew
Gen1.description: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.

Gen2.name: Chikorita
Gen2.description: A sweet aroma gently wafts from the leaf on its head. It is docile and loves to soak up the sun's rays.

Gen2.name: Bayleef
Gen2.description: The scent of spices comes from the curled-up leaves on its back. It is known to use healing herbs.

Gen2.name: Meganium
Gen2.description: The aroma that rises from its petals contains a substance that calms aggressive feelings.

Gen2.name: Cyndaquil
Gen2.description: It is timid and always curls itself up in a ball. If attacked, it flares up its back for protection.

Gen2.name: Quilava
Gen2.description: It intimidates foes with the heat of its flames. The fire burns more strongly when it readies to fight.

Gen2.name: Typhlosion
Gen2.description: It can hide behind a shimmering heat haze that it creates using its intense flames.

Gen2.name: Totodile
Gen2.description: It has the habit of biting anything with its developed jaws. Even its Trainer needs to be careful.

Gen2.name: Croconaw
Gen2.description: Once it bites down, it won’t let go until it loses its fangs. New fangs quickly grow into place.

Gen2.name: Feraligatr
Gen2.description: It opens its huge mouth to intimidate enemies. In battle, it runs using its thick and powerful hind legs.

Gen2.name: Sentret
Gen2.description: It stands on its tail so it can see a long way. If it spots an enemy, it cries loudly to warn its kind.

Gen2.name: Furret
Gen2.description: It makes a nest to suit its long and skinny body. The nest is impossible for other Pokémon to enter.

Gen2.name: Hoothoot
Gen2.description: It always stands on one foot. It changes feet so fast, the movement can rarely be seen.

Gen2.name: Noctowl
Gen2.description: Its eyes are specially adapted. They concentrate even faint light and enable it to see in the dark.

Gen2.name: Ledyba
Gen2.description: It is attracted by light at night. It can land safely on the ground without making a sound.

Gen2.name: Ledian
Gen2.description: When the weather grows warm, they flit about, scattering pollen from flower to flower.

Gen2.name: Spinarak
Gen2.description: It lies still in the same position for days on end, waiting for prey to come along.

Gen2.name: Ariados
Gen2.description: It spins string not only from its rear but also from its mouth. It can make a web that glows in the dark.

Gen2.name: Crobat
Gen2.description: It has three pairs of wings and can fly faster than a bullet train. It is said to be as fast as lightning.

Gen2.name: Chinchou
Gen2.description: It uses the two antennae on its head to sense the emotions of others. It is said to be good luck.

Gen2.name: Lanturn
Gen2.description: The bulb on its head emits infrasonic waves that can disrupt enemy Pokémon's sense of direction.

Gen2.name: Pichu
Gen2.description: Despite its small size, it can zap even adult humans. However, if it does so, it also surprises itself.

Gen2.name: Cleffa
Gen2.description: Because of its small size, it is easy to catch. It is said to be fond of sweets.

Gen2.name: Igglybuff
Gen2.description: It uses the sound of its voice to mesmerize foes. It is known to sing at precisely the right wavelength.

Gen2.name: Togepi
Gen2.description: The shell seems to be filled with joy. It is said that it will share good luck when treated kindly.

Gen2.name: Togetic
Gen2.description: It is said to be a Pokémon that brings happiness. It appears wherever there are people who are pure of heart.

Gen2.name: Natu
Gen2.description: It is said that a pair of Natu is the reincarnation of an ancient couple. They are always seen together.

Gen2.name: Xatu
Gen2.description: The feathers on its back are imbued with the power of the sun. It is said that they can predict the weather.

Gen2.name: Mareep
Gen2.description: The tip of its tail, which began as a small ball of fuzz, has grown into a fluffy, white cloud.

Gen2.name: Flaaffy
Gen2.description: If static electricity builds up in its body, it will send out a shower of sparks. Be especially careful in dry areas.

Gen2.name: Ampharos
Gen2.description: The tail's tip shines brightly and can be seen from far away. It is used to communicate with others.

Gen2.name: Bellossom
Gen2.description: When faced with danger, it shakes its body and scatters the toxic pollen that it has stored in its petals.

Gen2.name: Marill
Gen2.description: The oil-filled tail acts as a buoy, allowing it to swim in rivers and lakes.

Gen2.name: Azumarill
Gen2.description: The springy body is covered in bubbles that help it swim. The bubbles also keep its body warm in cold water.

Gen2.name: Sudowoodo
Gen2.description: It disguises itself as a tree to avoid being attacked by enemies. It hates water, so it never appears when it rains.

Gen2.name: Politoed
Gen2.description: When it croaks, it sounds like a human baby. The sound attracts other Pokémon, which Politoed then eats.

Gen2.name: Hoppip
Gen2.description: It is blown across vast distances by seasonal winds. It is said that when Hoppip gather in fields, it is a sign that rain will fall.

Gen2.name: Skiploom
Gen2.description: The more it drinks, the glossier this Pokémon's petals become. The petals then release a sweet fragrance.

Gen2.name: Jumpluff
Gen2.description: The cotton-like spores it releases, scatter in the wind. It is said that when they scatter, they bring good luck.

Gen2.name: Aipom
Gen2.description: Its tail is so powerful that it can use it to grab a tree branch and hold itself up in the air.

Gen2.name: Sunkern
Gen2.description: It is very weak. Its only means of defense is to shake its leaves desperately at its attacker.

Gen2.name: Sunflora
Gen2.description: It converts sunlight into energy. In the darkness after sunset, it closes its petals and becomes still.

Gen2.name: Yanma
Gen2.description: If it flaps its wings really fast, it can generate shock waves that will shatter windows in the area.

Gen2.name: Wooper
Gen2.description: When walking on land, it covers its body with a poisonous film that keeps its skin from dehydrating.

Gen2.name: Quagsire
Gen2.description: It has an easygoing nature. It doesn’t care if it bumps its head on boats and boulders while swimming.

Gen3.name: Treecko
Gen3.description: It makes its nest in a giant tree in the forest. It ferociously guards against anything nearing its territory.

Gen3.name: Grovyle
Gen3.description: It is agile on its feet, and it moves in a dance-like way. It attacks with its sharp leaves.

Gen3.name: Sceptile
Gen3.description: The leaves that grow on its arms can slice even the thickest of ropes. It is said to be able to fell a mighty tree in one blow.

Gen3.name: Torchic
Gen3.description: It has a flame sac inside its belly that perpetually burns. It feels warm if it is hugged.

Gen3.name: Combusken
Gen3.description: It boosts its concentration by emitting harsh cries. Its kicks have outstanding destructive power.

Gen3.name: Blaziken
Gen3.description: Flames spout from its wrists, enveloping its knuckles. Its punches scorch its foes.

Gen3.name: Mudkip
Gen3.description: To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

Gen3.name: Marshtomp
Gen3.description: Its sturdy legs give it sure footing, even in mud. It burrows into dirt to sleep.

Gen3.name: Swampert
Gen3.description: It can swim while towing a large ship. It bashes down foes with a swing of its thick arms.

Gen3.name: Poochyena
Gen3.description: It savagely threatens foes with bared fangs. It chases after fleeing targets tenaciously.

Gen3.name: Mightyena
Gen3.description: It will always obey the commands of a skilled Trainer. Its behavior arises from its living in packs.

Gen3.name: Zigzagoon
Gen3.description: It walks in zigzag fashion. It is good at finding items in the grass and even in the ground.

Gen3.name: Linoone
Gen3.description: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

Gen3.name: Wurmple
Gen3.description: It sticks to tree branches and eats leaves. The thread it spits from its mouth, which becomes gooey when it touches air, slows the movement of its foes.

Gen3.name: Silcoon
Gen3.description: It prepares for evolution by hardening its shell as much as possible to protect its soft body.

Gen3.name: Beautifly
Gen3.description: Despite its appearance, it has an aggressive nature. It attacks by jabbing with its long, thin mouth.

Gen3.name: Cascoon
Gen3.description: It endures attacks with patience, because the more pain before evolution, the sturdier it becomes.

Gen3.name: Dustox
Gen3.description: It is a nocturnal Pokémon. Drawn by streetlights, they messily eat the leaves of trees lining boulevards.

Gen3.name: Lotad
Gen3.description: It is found all over the Hoenn region. It is often seen floating on the water with its broad leaf serving as a sail.

Gen3.name: Lombre
Gen3.description: It is said to appear on rainy days. There are songs about it in Hoennian culture.

Gen3.name: Ludicolo
Gen3.description: It is said to be very fortunate if a Ludicolo appears at your door. It is always dancing.

Gen3.name: Seedot
Gen3.description: It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of its head. It sucks moisture from the tree while hanging off the branch.

Gen3.name: Nuzleaf
Gen3.description: It lives in the treetops of tropical rain forests. The more water it drinks, the glossier this Pokémon's leaves become.

Gen3.name: Shiftry
Gen3.description: Shiftry's ears are said to be the result of a mutation caused by exposure to the moon's waves. It is active at night.

Gen3.name: Taillow
Gen3.description: Although its body is small, its vocal cords are very powerful. It can sing at precisely the right wavelength.

Gen3.name: Swellow
Gen3.description: The muscle that makes up its body is very thin. It can fly silently through the sky.

Gen3.name: Wingull
Gen3.description: It soars high in the sky, riding on updrafts like a glider. It makes its nest on steep cliffs.

Gen3.name: Pelipper
Gen3.description: It has a large beak and a big belly. It skims over the surface of the water with its beak wide open.

Gen3.name: Ralts
Gen3.description: The feeling of the horn on its head bothers it. It often meditates in an attempt to calm itself.

Gen3.name: Kirlia
Gen3.description: A POKéMON that uses the horns on its head to sense the emotions of people. It is said to be highly attuned to the feelings of others.

Gen3.name: Gardevoir
Gen3.description: A POKéMON that can see the future. It is said to appear before those who are about to die, to farewell them.

Gen3.name: Surskit
Gen3.description: It lives on ponds and lakes, skimming across the surface as if it were skating on ice.

Gen3.name: Masquerain
Gen3.description: Its antennae have eye patterns on them. Its four wings allow it to fly in any direction.

Gen3.name: Shroomish
Gen3.description: It prefers damp places. By day it remains still in the forest shade. It releases toxic powder from its head.

Gen3.name: Breloom
Gen3.description: It scatters spores from holes in the cap on its head. It loves to eat forest mushrooms.

Gen3.name: Slakoth
Gen3.description: It sleeps for 20 hours every day. Making drowsy those that see it is one of its abilities.

Gen3.name: Vigoroth
Gen3.description: It can't keep still because its blood boils with energy. It runs through the fields in a zigzag pattern.

Gen3.name: Slaking
Gen3.description: It is the world's laziest Pokémon. It moves only when there is no more food within reach.

Gen3.name: Nincada
Gen3.description: It grows underground, sensing its surroundings using antennae instead of its virtually blind eyes.

Gen3.name: Ninjask
Gen3.description: Because it moves so quickly, it sometimes becomes unseeable. It congregates around tree sap.

Gen3.name: Shedinja
Gen3.description: A strange Pokémon—it flies without moving its wings, has a hollow shell, and is said to steal the spirit of anyone peering into its body.

Gen3.name: Whismur
Gen3.description: It is very timid. If startled, it shrieks at the same volume as a jet plane.

Gen3.name: Loudred
Gen3.description: It positions the round speakers on its head to face outwards. It blasts sound waves from them.

Gen3.name: Exploud
Gen3.description: Its howls can be heard over six miles away. It emits all sorts of noises from the ports on its body.

Gen3.name: Makuhita
Gen3.description: It toughens its body by slamming into thick trees. Many snapped trees can be found near its nest.

Gen3.name: Hariyama
Gen3.description: It loves to match power with big-bodied Pokémon. It can send a 10-ton truck flying with a straight-arm punch.

Gen3.name: Azurill
Gen3.description: It spins its tail as if it were a lasso, then hurls it far. The momentum launches its body.

Gen3.name: Nosepass
Gen3.description: Its magnetic nose always points north. Travelers check Nosepass to get their bearings.

Gen3.name: Skitty
Gen3.description: It is said to be difficult to earn its trust. It is extremely popular as a pet because of its adorable looks.

Gen3.name: Delcatty
Gen3.description: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not like to fight.

Gen3.name: Sableye
Gen3.description: It feeds on gemstone crystals. In darkness, its eyes sparkle with the glitter of jewels.

Gen3.name: Mawile
Gen3.description: It uses its steel jaws to bite enemies. It can chew through iron beams.

Gen3.name: Aron
Gen3.description: It eats iron ore - and sometimes railroad tracks - to build up the steel armor that protects its body.

Gen3.name: Lairon
Gen3.description: It habitually shows off its strength. It charges at foes with a body like steel.

Gen3.name: Aggron
Gen3.description: It claims an entire mountain as its own. The more wounds it has, the more it has battled.

Gen3.name: Meditite
Gen3.description: It always trains deep in mountains. It levitates when it heightens its spiritual power through meditation.

Gen3.name: Medicham
Gen3.description: Through yoga training, it gained the psychic power to predict its foe's next move.

Gen3.name: Electrike
Gen3.description: It stores static electricity in its fur for discharging. It gives off sparks if a storm approaches.

Gen3.name: Manectric
Gen3.description: It discharges electricity from its mane. It creates thunderclouds above its head.

Gen3.name: Plusle
Gen3.description: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It is always seen with Minun.

Gen3.name: Minun
Gen3.description: It cheers on friends with pom-poms made of sparks. It is always seen with Plusle.

Gen3.name: Volbeat
Gen3.description: It communicates with others by lighting up its tail. It loves the sweet aroma given off by Illumise.

Gen3.name: Illumise
Gen3.description: Its fragrance attracts Volbeat. With its sweet aroma, it guides Volbeat to draw patterns in the night sky.

Gen3.name: Roselia
Gen3.description: The more healthy its flowers, the more pleasant its aroma. It attacks with thorny whips.

Gen3.name: Gulpin
Gen3.description: Almost all its body is its stomach. Its digestive fluids can dissolve anything.

Gen3.name: Swalot
Gen3.description: It can swallow anything whole. It secretes a powerful fluid from its mouth to dissolve anything.

Gen3.name: Carvanha
Gen3.description: They swarm any foe that invades their territory. Their sharp fangs can tear out boat hulls.

Gen3.name: Sharpedo
Gen3.description: The ruffian of the seas. Its fangs are so sharp, it can rip through iron and steel.

Gen3.name: Wailmer
Gen3.description: It eats one ton of food every day. It plays by shooting stored seawater out its blowholes.

Gen3.name: Wailord
Gen3.description: It is the largest of all identified Pokémon. It jumps as it swims in the sea.

Gen3.name: Numel
Gen3.description: It stores magma in its hump. It is easy to get it to lose its temper by touching its hump.

Gen3.name: Camerupt
Gen3.description: The volcanoes on its back erupt every 10 years, or when it becomes angry.

Gen3.name: Torkoal
Gen3.description: It burns coal inside its shell for energy. It blows out black soot if it is endangered.

Gen3.name: Spoink
Gen3.description: It bounces around on its tail. The shock of its bouncing makes its heart pump.

Gen3.name: Grumpig
Gen3.description: It uses the black pearls on its body to amplify its psychic power.

Gen3.name: Spinda
Gen3.description: No two Spinda have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step confuses opponents.

Gen3.name: Trapinch
Gen3.description: It makes a conical pit in desert sand and lies in wait at the bottom for prey to come tumbling down.

Gen3.name: Vibrava
Gen3.description: It vibrates its wings to create ultrasonic waves. It travels in the desert in search of prey.

Gen3.name: Flygon
Gen3.description: It is nicknamed “the Desert Spirit” because the flapping of its wings sounds like singing.

Gen3.name: Cacnea
Gen3.description: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

Gen3.name: Cacturne
Gen3.description: Packs of them follow travelers through the desert until the travelers can no longer move.

Gen3.name: Swablu
Gen3.description: It constantly grooms its cotton-like wings. It takes a shower to clean itself if it becomes dirty.

Gen3.name: Altaria
Gen3.description: It hums in a beautiful soprano voice. It flies among white clouds in the blue sky.

Gen3.name: Zangoose
Gen3.description: It has feuded with Seviper for many generations. Its sharp claws are its greatest weapon.

Gen3.name: Seviper
Gen3.description: For many generations, it has feuded with Zangoose. Its swordlike tail serves as a weapon.

Gen3.name: Lunatone
Gen3.description: It was discovered at the site of a meteor strike. It moves by floating in the air.

Gen3.name: Solrock
Gen3.description: It absorbs solar energy during the day. Always expressionless, it can sense what its foe is thinking.

Gen3.name: Barboach
Gen3.description: Its whiskers make a superb radar. They are used to locate prey, even in the murkiest of water.

Gen3.name: Whiscash
Gen3.description: It makes its nest at the bottom of swamps. It will eat anything—if it is alive, Whiscash will eat it.

Gen3.name: Corphish
Gen3.description: It came from overseas. It is a very hardy creature that will quickly proliferate, even in polluted water.

Gen3.name: Crawdaunt
Gen3.description: A brutish Pokémon that loves to battle. A veteran Crawdaunt that has prevailed in many battles is covered in scars.

Gen3.name: Baltoy
Gen3.description: It moves by spinning on its foot. It was discovered in ancient ruins.

Gen3.name: Claydol
Gen3.description: An ancient clay figurine that came to life as a Pokémon from exposure to a mysterious ray of light.

Gen3.name: Lileep
Gen3.description: It disguises itself as seaweed by waving its tentacles. It lives on the sea floor.

Gen3.name: Cradily
Gen3.description: It lives in the shallows of warm seas. It extends its tentacles to catch prey.

Gen3.name: Anorith
Gen3.description: It was resurrected from a fossil. It uses its two large claws to capture prey.

Gen3.name: Armaldo
Gen3.description: It went ashore after evolving. Its entire body is clad in a sturdy armor.

Gen3.name: Feebas
Gen3.description: It is a shabby and ugly Pokémon. It is very hardy and can survive in any body of water.

Gen3.name: Milotic
Gen3.description: It is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon in the Hoenn region. It can easily seduce people.

Gen3.name: Castform
Gen3.description: Its form changes with the weather. Sunny days bring out a spicy aroma from the pistil of its flower.

Gen3.name: Kecleon
Gen3.description: It can change its body color to blend in with its surroundings. The change in color is not always successful.

Gen3.name: Shuppet
Gen3.description: It loves to feed on feelings such as envy and malice. It is said to lay a curse to its target.

Gen3.name: Banette
Gen3.description: A doll-like Pokémon that is possessed by a mischievous spirit. It seeks revenge on the one that abandoned it.

Gen3.name: Duskull
Gen3.description: It can pass through any wall. It is said that it arrives on the scene of a disaster almost immediately.

Gen3.name: Dusclops
Gen3.description: A POKéMON that can control the dark. It is said that it will steal the spirit of anyone who dares to disturb its sleep.

Gen3.name: Tropius
Gen3.description: The bunches of fruit around its neck ripen twice a year and are delicious. It is said that they taste like the fruit of the legendary tree.

Gen3.name: Chimecho
Gen3.description: It uses the bell on its head to sense the emotions of others. It is said to be good luck if you hear its chimes.

Gen3.name: Absol
Gen3.description: It is said to be a Pokémon that brings disaster. It is not accepted by humans and always lives alone.

Gen3.name: Wynaut
Gen3.description: It hatches from a small, round egg. It loves to play and is often seen bouncing around.

Gen3.name: Snorunt
Gen3.description: It is said that a Snorunt will bring happiness to a trainer who can make it evolve into a Glalie.

Gen3.name: Glalie
Gen3.description: It has a body of solid ice. It can freeze moisture in the air instantly, creating blizzards.

Gen3.name: Spheal
Gen3.description: It loves to play in the snow. It also enjoys swimming in cold waters.

Gen3.name: Sealeo
Gen3.description: It uses the sharp tusks on its flippers to crack the ice that covers its swimming areas.

Gen3.name: Walrein
Gen3.description: It is said that a Walrein can swim continuously across the sea without ever stopping to rest.

Gen3.name: Clamperl
Gen3.description: It is found in the Hoenn region. It is said that the more beautiful the shell, the more powerful the Pokémon inside.

Gen3.name: Huntail
Gen3.description: It lives deep in the sea. With a body like a torpedo, it swims as fast as a jet ski.

Gen3.name: Gorebyss
Gen3.description: It is said to be the most beautiful Pokémon in the Hoenn region. It can easily seduce people.

Gen3.name: Relicanth
Gen3.description: A Pokémon that has not changed at all for 100 million years. It is said to have been alive since the age of the dinosaurs.

Gen3.name: Luvdisc
Gen3.description: It is said that a Luvdisc will bring happiness to a Trainer who can make it evolve into a Milotic.

Gen3.name: Bagon
Gen3.description: It is still not known exactly how the energy from the Dragon Fang is transmitted to Bagon to make it evolve.

Gen3.name: Shelgon
Gen3.description: The shell covering its body is as hard as iron. It is said that this Pokémon can withstand a bullet train collision.

Gen3.name: Salamence
Gen3.description: It flies at speeds equal to a jet fighter. The flaps of its wings create shock waves that can topple buildings.

Gen3.name: Beldum
Gen3.description: It is thought that Beldum's body is made of a metal alloy. It is not affected by most physical attacks.

Gen3.name: Metang
Gen3.description: Metang's body is made of a special metal that is very light and super strong. It can fly at high speeds.

Gen3.name: Metagross
Gen3.description: Metagross has four brains that can float in the air. It uses these brains to calculate and plan its actions.

Gen3.name: Regirock
Gen3.description: Regirock's body is made of a rock-like material. It is said to have been born from the union of a rock and a Pokémon.

Gen3.name: Regice
Gen3.description: Regice's body is made of ice. It is said to have been born from the union of ice and a Pokémon.

Gen3.name: Registeel
Gen3.description: Registeel's body is made of a steel-like material. It is said to have been born from the union of steel and a Pokémon.

Gen3.name: Latias
Gen3.description: Latias is covered with a fine, downy fur. It can fly faster than the speed of sound.

Gen3.name: Latios
Gen3.description: Latios is covered with a fine, downy fur. It can fly faster than the speed of sound.

Gen3.name: Kyogre
Gen3.description: Kyogre is said to have expanded the seas by bringing heavy rains. It is worshiped by some as a sea deity.

Gen3.name: Groudon
Gen3.description: Groudon is said to have expanded the continents and raised the land from the sea. It is worshiped by some as a land deity.

Gen3.name: Rayquaza
Gen3.description: Rayquaza is said to have lived for hundreds of millions of years. It is thought to have been the first Pokémon to fly.

Gen3.name: Jirachi
Gen3.description: Jirachi is said to have granted wishes. It is awake for only seven days every thousand years.

Gen3.name: Deoxys
Gen3.description: Deoxys is a Pokémon that came from space. Its DNA is almost the same as that of humans.

Gen4.name: Turtwig
Gen4.description: Made from soil, the shell on its back hardens when it drinks water. It lives along lakes.

Gen4.name: Grotle
Gen4.description: It lives along water in forests. In the daytime, it leaves the forest to sunbathe its treed shell.

Gen4.name: Torterra
Gen4.description: Some Pokémon are born on a Torterra's back and spend their entire life there.

Gen4.name: Chimchar
Gen4.description: It agilely scales sheer cliffs to live atop craggy mountains. Its fire is put out when it sleeps.

Gen4.name: Monferno
Gen4.description: It skillfully controls the intensity of the fire on its tail to keep its foes at an ideal distance.

Gen4.name: Infernape
Gen4.description: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.

Gen4.name: Piplup
Gen4.description: Because it is very proud, it hates accepting food from people. Its thick down guards it from cold.

Gen4.name: Prinplup
Gen4.description: It lives alone, away from others. Apparently, every one of them believes it is the most important.

Gen4.name: Empoleon
Gen4.description: The three horns that extend from its beak attest to its power. The leader has the biggest horns.

Gen4.name: Starly
Gen4.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

Gen4.name: Staravia
Gen4.description: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this POKéMON will fiercely peck at any intruder.

Gen4.name: Staraptor
Gen4.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as MAGIKARP.

Gen4.name: Bidoof
Gen4.description: Bidoof's habitat is near water. It loves to gnaw on logs and bark.

Gen4.name: Bibarel
Gen4.description: It makes its nest by damming streams with bark and mud. It is known as an industrious worker.

Gen4.name: Kricketot
Gen4.description: It rubs its two hind legs together to create a high-frequency sound. This sound is used to communicate with others.

Gen4.name: Kricketune
Gen4.description: It is covered by a sturdy shell that protects it from enemies. It can easily knock a telephone pole over.

Gen4.name: Shinx
Gen4.description: It generates electricity using the pads on its limbs. It can release stored electricity from the tip of its tail.

Gen4.name: Luxio
Gen4.description: It creates a small, low-level electric shock. It uses this ability to startle prey and to communicate with others.

Gen4.name: Luxray
Gen4.description: The gleam of its eyes indicates the location of its prey. It can see through walls and other obstacles.

Gen4.name: Budew
Gen4.description: The bud on this Pokémon's body emits a foul fragrance when it is in danger. The stench worsens as the level of danger increases.

Gen4.name: Roserade
Gen4.description: The more healthy and abundant the roses, the more powerful its pollen becomes. It is said to be able to cause paralysis.

Gen4.name: Cranidos
Gen4.description: Its brain is protected by a steel-like skull. It is said that a Cranidos's skull is harder than any metal.

Gen4.name: Rampardos
Gen4.description: The head of this Pokémon is as hard as a diamond. It is said that it can smash through any obstacle.

Gen4.name: Shieldon
Gen4.description: It is covered by a hard shell. It is said that the shell can withstand any attack.

Gen4.name: Bastiodon
Gen4.description: The stone face on its front is impenetrable. It is said that no enemy can break through its defenses.

Gen4.name: Burmy
Gen4.description: It is covered by a special cloth that protects it from enemies. The cloth is made from the leaves and branches of trees.

Gen4.name: Wormadam
Gen4.description: The bagworm Pokémon. It is covered in twigs and leaves that it uses to camouflage itself.

Gen4.name: Mothim
Gen4.description: It flits about at night and steals the honey of flowers. It is said to be drawn by the sweet scent of honey.

Gen4.name: Combee
Gen4.description: It gathers honey every day. The more honey it collects, the more the barrel-shaped body on its back expands.

Gen4.name: Vespiquen
Gen4.description: It can control a swarm of Combee. It is said that the honey it produces can be used as a powerful medicine.

Gen4.name: Pachirisu
Gen4.description: It stores electrical energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

Gen4.name: Buizel
Gen4.description: It swims using the two tails. It has a low tendency to be seen in the open, but it can be found in shallow waters.

Gen4.name: Floatzel
Gen4.description: It has a buoyant body that is filled with air. It can float on water for long periods of time.

Gen4.name: Cherubi
Gen4.description: The small ball holds the nutrients needed for it to evolve. It can be found in forests and grasslands.

Gen4.name: Cherrim
Gen4.description: It blooms when the sun comes out. It is said that a Cherrim that is always in bloom is a sign of good weather.

Gen4.name: Shellos
Gen4.description: The fluid filled in the shell is a strong acid. It can dissolve anything, even metal.

Gen4.name: Gastrodon
Gen4.description: The external shell is hardened mud. The mud hardens when it dries up, so this Pokémon can easily withstand attacks.

Gen4.name: Ambipom
Gen4.description: It uses its two tails to expertly catch prey. It is known to strike with the tails at the same time.

Gen4.name: Drifloon
Gen4.description: It grabs the hands of children and drags them away to the afterlife. It is said to be the spirits of children.

Gen4.name: Drifblim
Gen4.description: It is said that this Pokémon is born when a departed spirit possesses a set of bones.

Gen4.name: Buneary
Gen4.description: It bounces around using its big ears. It can easily escape from the clutches of a Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Lopunny
Gen4.description: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not like to fight.

Gen4.name: Mismagius
Gen4.description: It cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice. It is almost invisible.

Gen4.name: Honchkrow
Gen4.description: It is said that when the sun sets, it becomes even more powerful. It is the boss of the Murkrow.

Gen4.name: Glameow
Gen4.description: It uses the sharp claws on its forelegs to scratch and climb trees. It is very agile.

Gen4.name: Purugly
Gen4.description: It is highly popular among female Trainers for its sublime fur. It does not like to fight.

Gen4.name: Chingling
Gen4.description: It emits a soothing sound from the bell on its head. It is said to bring happiness to those who hear it.

Gen4.name: Stunky
Gen4.description: It releases a foul fluid from its rear. The fluid is so potent, it can even corrode metal.

Gen4.name: Skuntank
Gen4.description: It attacks by spraying a foul-smelling fluid from the tip of its tail. The stench lingers for 24 hours.

Gen4.name: Bronzor
Gen4.description: It is not affected by most physical attacks. It is said to be made of a metal alloy.

Gen4.name: Bronzong
Gen4.description: It puts to sleep anyone who approaches it. It uses this ability to protect its territory.

Gen4.name: Bonsly
Gen4.description: It prefers to live in isolation. It is not bothered by the cold, and it can easily withstand freezing temperatures.

Gen4.name: Mime Jr.
Gen4.description: It mimics the expressions and mannerisms of those it sees. It is said to be a master of disguise.
Gen4.evolution: Mime Jr. → Mr. Mime → Mr. Rime

Gen4.name: Happiny
Gen4.description: A Pokémon that brings happiness. It is said to have been born from a egg that was carried here by a Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Chatot
Gen4.description: It can learn and speak human words. It is said that a Chatot that has learned a lot of words becomes a good speaker.

Gen4.name: Spiritomb
Gen4.description: It was formed by the spirits of people and Pokémon. It is said to lay a curse to its target.

Gen4.name: Gible
Gen4.description: It burrows through the ground at a shallow depth. It can easily knock over a 10-ton truck.

Gen4.name: Gabite
Gen4.description: It is said that when this Pokémon is ready to evolve, it can sense the location of its future mate.

Gen4.name: Garchomp
Gen4.description: It is said that when one runs at high speed, it can easily overtake an airplane. Its fangs can tear through steel.

Gen4.name: Munchlax
Gen4.description: It is not satisfied unless it eats over 880 pounds of food every day. It is said to be always hungry.

Gen4.name: Riolu
Gen4.description: It uses the energy within its body to sense the emotions of others. It is said to be very in tune with its Trainer's feelings.

Gen4.name: Lucario
Gen4.description: It has the ability to sense the auras of all things. It is said that only a Chosen One can control Lucario.

Gen4.name: Hippopotas
Gen4.description: It is born on the sand. When it is born, its body is covered in a thick layer of sand to protect it from the sun.

Gen4.name: Hippowdon
Gen4.description: It is said that the flaps on its body can create waves as high as 10 feet. It is a powerful swimmer.

Gen4.name: Skorupi
Gen4.description: It attacks using the claws on its arms. It is said that the more scars it has, the more powerful it is.

Gen4.name: Drapion
Gen4.description: It is said that the more scars it has, the more powerful it is. It can move quickly in the dark.

Gen4.name: Croagunk
Gen4.description: It uses the liquid in the poison sac in its belly to melt foes. It is said to be very toxic.

Gen4.name: Toxicroak
Gen4.description: It attacks with its sword-like arms. It is said that the more scars it has, the more powerful it is.

Gen4.name: Carnivine
Gen4.description: It ensnares prey with its vines and devours them whole. It is said to be able to go for weeks without eating.

Gen4.name: Finneon
Gen4.description: It is found in the seas of the Sinnoh region. It is said to be able to swim at speeds of up to 60 mph.

Gen4.name: Lumineon
Gen4.description: The light-emitting fins on its body are used to communicate with others. It is said to be very social.

Gen4.name: Mantyke
Gen4.description: It swims in the sea with a wave-like motion. It is said to be able to communicate with other Pokémon using ultrasonic waves.

Gen4.name: Snover
Gen4.description: It is said that a Snover will bring happiness to a trainer who can make it evolve into a Glalie.

Gen4.name: Abomasnow
Gen4.description: It is said that the flaps on its body can create waves as high as 10 feet. It is a powerful swimmer.

Gen4.name: Weavile
Gen4.description: It moves quickly and stealthily. It is said to be able to take down a foe with a single blow.

Gen4.name: Magnezone
Gen4.description: Formed by several MAGNEMITEs linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.

Gen4.name: Lickilicky
Gen4.description: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

Gen4.name: Rhyperior
Gen4.description: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

Gen4.name: Tangrowth
Gen4.description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.

Gen4.name: Electivire
Gen4.description: It discharges electricity from its arms. It creates thunderclouds above its head.

Gen4.name: Magmortar
Gen4.description: It is said that a Magmortar can shoot flames that are hot enough to melt boulders.

Gen4.name: Togekiss
Gen4.description: It is said to be a Pokémon that brings happiness. It appears wherever there are people who are pure of heart.

Gen4.name: Yanmega
Gen4.description: It flies around at speeds that can rival a jet fighter. The flaps of its wings create shock waves.

Gen4.name: Leafeon
Gen4.description: It is said that when the temperature drops, it can be seen rubbing its body against trees.

Gen4.name: Glaceon
Gen4.description: It can freeze the moisture in the air. It is said that it can create blizzards.

Gen4.name: Gliscor
Gen4.description: It glides through the air with the greatest of ease. It strikes with its sword-like tail.

Gen4.name: Mamoswine
Gen4.description: It is said that a Mamoswine can swim continuously across the sea without ever stopping to rest.

Gen4.name: Porygon-Z
Gen4.description: A POKéMON that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

Gen4.name: Gallade
Gen4.description: It uses a special kind of martial arts involving all its limbs. Its fire never goes out.

Gen4.name: Probopass
Gen4.description: The three units that compose its body were separated long ago. They rejoined recently.

Gen4.name: Dusknoir
Gen4.description: It is said that Dusknoir can control the dark. It is said that it will steal the spirit of anyone who dares to disturb its sleep.

Gen4.name: Froslass
Gen4.description: It is said that a Froslass will bring happiness to a trainer who can make it evolve into a Glalie.

Gen4.name: Rotom
Gen4.description: It is said to be a Pokémon that brings disaster. It is not accepted by humans and always lives alone.

Gen4.name: Uxie
Gen4.description: It is said that Uxie brought knowledge to the world. It is said to have shaped the very first Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Mesprit
Gen4.description: It is said that Mesprit brought emotion to the world. It is said to have shaped the very first Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Azelf
Gen4.description: It is said that Azelf brought willpower to the world. It is said to have shaped the very first Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Dialga
Gen4.description: Dialga can control time. It is said that it can warp time and space.

Gen4.name: Palkia
Gen4.description: Palkia can control space. It is said that it can distort space and time.

Gen4.name: Heatran
Gen4.description: Heatran dwells in volcanic caves. It is said to be able to create new islands by erupting.

Gen4.name: Regigigas
Gen4.description: Regigigas is said to have towed continents. It is described as the continent Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Giratina
Gen4.description: Giratina is said to have created the Distortion World. It is known as the Renegade Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Cresselia
Gen4.description: Cresselia is said to represent the crescent moon. It is known as the Lunar Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Phione
Gen4.description: Phione is said to be born from a droplet of Arceus's sweat. It is known as the Sea Drifting Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Manaphy
Gen4.description: Manaphy is said to be able to bond with any Pokémon. It is known as the Seafaring Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Darkrai
Gen4.description: Darkrai is said to be able to cause nightmares. It is known as the Pitch-Black Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Shaymin
Gen4.description: Shaymin is said to be able to purify the air. It is known as the Gratitude Pokémon.

Gen4.name: Arceus
Gen4.description: Arceus is said to have created the Sinnoh region. It is known as the Original One.
